name: Diggy Diggy Miner
description:
Throw your claw, go deep and catch as many precious resources as you can on your way up! Upgrade your equipment to catch more prized stones and to excavate deeper, make rare finds and discover new gems!

Diggy Diggy Miner! features:

- Simple and addictive gameplay: Tap, throw down your hook and collect as many resources as you can!
- Upgrade your equipment to grab more precious rocks and to reach deeper depths!
- The miner will continue to earn money for you when you’re away and out of game!

Can you discover the mysteries that lie in the deep? Go Diggy Diggy Miner!

Bump others as you go up in the leaderboards and increase your earnings! Do a bunch of researches to collect all hooked jewels from the ground. Do you love fishing? Collecting precious stone is easier than fishing! The deeper you go the easier it will be for you to fish for these rocks.
Go deeper and try not to bump into mines or you will lose all your collection! Fishing for precious mines is a lot more rewarding than fishing fish! Try this fun game and invite all your friends.
